statements: DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM UserProfile WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE relevance_score < 0.5 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01');
DELETE FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 100 AND recommendation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM Preferences WHERE user_id = '5e9c17e1-1451-41d5-bbf0-8b421480b136' AND category = 'Food';
